name: ALPACA AIR ATTACK!!
description:
ALPACA AIR ATTACK!!! is a multiplayer dogfighting game for up to 4 ALPACAS!

Shoot the other ALPACA pilots with your wool!

But watch out!
If you get hit by your opponents' wool, it will drag you off course!
The more you gather, the worse it gets.

So stop woolgathering and join the fight!!!

Developers

  • Sebastian Krause - Programming and VisualFX
  • Daniel Simon - Aircraft Model
  • Julia Wolf - Alpaca Model, Mountains and 2D Art

Music and SoundFX by Vivien Baguio and Lena Bohns

You can use you ALPAController:

Or your ALPACeyboard:

ALPACA AIR ATTACK!!! was developed in 72 hours for the game jam Ludum Dare 40.
